channel.title: Readme on Micro Services
channel.description: Recent content in Readme on Micro Services

item.title: chats
item.description: Chats is a service for direct messaging Chats Service The chats service enables direct messaging between one or more parties.

item.title: datastore
item.description: Document data storage Datastore Service The Datastore service is a document store with a simplified query model for everyone.

item.title: feeds
item.description: A single uniform API for crawling and indexing RSS feeds

item.title: files
item.description: Store, list and retrieve text files Files Service Save, list and retrieve text files by project and path.

item.title: geocoding
item.description: Geocode an address to gps location and the reverse. Geocoding Service The geocoding service provides address to lat lng geocoding as well as the reverse.

item.title: groups
item.description: Manage group memberships Groups Service The group service is a basic CRUD service for group membership management.

item.title: helloworld
item.description: Returns personalised hello world Helloworld Service Helloworld simply returns a personalized message in response to a name.

item.title: image
item.description: Quickly upload, resize and convert images Image Service The image service provides upload, resize and image conversion.

item.title: invites
item.description: Manage and send user and group invites Invites Service The invites services allows you to create and manage invites for users and groups by providing invite codes.

item.title: location
item.description: Real time GPS location tracking and search Location Service Send, store and search real time gps point data and tracking info using the location API.

item.title: otp
item.description: One time password service OTP Service Generate one time passwords (OTP) for any unique id, email or user.

item.title: places
item.description: Store and search for points of interest Places Service The places API stores points of interest and enables you to search for places nearby or last visited.

item.title: posts
item.description: Build a blog or the foundations of a headless CMS with posts

item.title: routing
item.description: Etas, routes and turn by turn directions Routing Service The routing service provides etas, gps routes and turn by turn directions.

item.title: seen
item.description: Seen is a service to keep track of which resources a user has seen (read).

item.title: sentiment
item.description: Real time sentiment analysis Sentiment Service The sentiment service provides rudimentary sentiment analysis on text

item.title: streams
item.description: PubSub streaming and websockets Streams Service The streams service provides an event stream, designed for sending messages from a server to mutliple clients connecting via Websockets.

item.title: tags
item.description: Generate tags and metadata for any resource Tag Service The tags service enables creation of tags for any resource by saving a tag associated with their respective ID

item.title: threads
item.description: Threaded conversations Threads Service Threads provides threaded conversations as a service grouped by topics.

item.title: users
item.description: Usage management and authentication Users Service The user service provides user management, storage and authentication.
